titles.title: A bill to designate the United States courthouse facility located at 301 North Miami Avenue, Miami, Florida, as the "C. Clyde Atkins United States Courthouse".
A bill to designate the United States courthouse facility located at 301 North Miami Avenue, Miami, Florida, as the "C. Clyde Atkins United States Courthouse".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: Designates the United States courthouse facililty located at 301 North Miami Avenue, Miami, Florida, as the "C. Clyde Atkins United States Courthouse."
